info.task: navigate forwards to a heading inside a main landmark
info.title: Navigate forwards to a heading inside a main landmark

setupScript.name: setFocusBeforeMain
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link before the main landmark
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on a link before the main landmark
testPageDocument.getElementById('beforelink').focus();

user: With focus on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Main Landmark' heading.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Main Landmark' heading.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.

assertions.expectation: Name of the heading, 'Main Landmark', is conveyed
